# A War Time Escape

| runtime        = 980 ft
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent film(English intertitles)
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
A War Time Escape is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier, Jack J. Clark and Robert Vignola in the leading roles.
Cast
* Gene Gauntier
* Jack J. Clark
* Robert Vignola
Production notes
The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida.
External links
*
* [http://www.sidneyolcott.com/A_War_Time.htm A War Time Escape] website dedicated to Sidney Olcott
